name: anthologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who collects artistic works into an anthology (= a collection of artistic works with a similar form or subject): He is a professional anthologist who compiles a yearly collection of the best new short stories. The project honours the work of American folk music anthologist Harry Smith. See
anthology
More examplesFewer examplesHe wrote skits and film scenarios, and was an inspired anthologist.A lyric poet whose work has won the Pulitzer Prize, she's also a highly respected anthologist.She is a novelist as well as an anthologist and the editor of a series of popular collections.
